original: Śroṇa (1st)
analyzed: śroṇa

original: śaripūtra idam avocat /
analyzed: śaripūtraḥ idam avocat

original: ye ke cic chroṇa śramaṇā vā brāhamaṇā vā anityena rūpeṇādhruveṇānāśvāsikena vipariṇāmadharmaṇā
analyzed: ye ke cit śroṇa śramaṇāḥ vā brāhamaṇāḥ vā anityena rūpeṇa adhruveṇa anāśvāsikena vipariṇāma dharmaṇā

original: śreyaṁsaḥ sma iti manyante sadṛśās sma iti manyante hīnāḥ sma iti manyante nānyatra
analyzed: śreyasaḥ smaḥ iti manyante sadṛśāḥ smaḥ iti manyante hīnāḥ smaḥ iti manyante na anyatra

original: te śroṇa śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ yathābhūtasyādarśanāt /
analyzed: te śroṇa śramaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā evam yathā bhūtasya a darśanāt

original: ye ke cic chroṇa śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anityayā vedanayā saṁjñayā saṁskārair anityena
analyzed: ye ke cit śroṇa śramaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā anityayā vedanayā sajñayā saskāraiḥ anityena

original: vijñānenādhruveṇānāśvasikena vipariṇāmadharmaṇā vijñānena śreyāṁsaḥ sma iti manyante
analyzed: vijñānena adhruveṇa anāśvasikena vipariṇāma dharmaṇā vijñānena śreyāsaḥ smaḥ iti manyante

original: sadṛśāḥ sma iti manyante hīnāḥ sma iti manyante nānyatra te śroṇaśramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā
analyzed: sadṛśāḥ smaḥ iti manyante hīnāḥ smaḥ iti manyante na anyatra te śroṇa śramaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇā

original: vā evaṁ yathābhūtasyādarśanād /
analyzed: vai evam yathā bhūtasya a darśanāt

original: ye tu kecit śroṇa śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anityena rūpeṇādhruveṇānāśvāsikena vipariṇāmadharmaṇā
analyzed: ye tu kecid śroṇa śramaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā anityena rūpeṇa adhruveṇa anāśvāsikena vipariṇāma dharmaṇā

original: rūpeṇa na śreyāmsaḥ sma iti manyante na sadṛśāḥ sma iti manyante na hīnāḥ sma iti
analyzed: rūpeṇa na śreyāmsaḥ smaḥ iti manyante na sadṛśāḥ smaḥ iti manyante na hīnāḥ smaḥ iti

original: manyante nānyatra te śroṇa śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā anityayā vedanayā saṁjñayā saṁskārair
analyzed: manyante na anyatra te śroṇa śramaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā anityayā vedanayā sajñayā saskāraiḥ

original: anityena vijñānenādhruveṇānāśvāsikena vipariṇāmadharmaṇā vijñānena na śreyāṁsaḥ sma
analyzed: anityena vijñānena adhruveṇa anāśvāsikena vipariṇāma dharmaṇā vijñānena na śreyāsaḥ sma

original: iti manyante na sadṛśaḥ sma iti manyante na hīnāḥ sma iti manyante nānyatra te śroṇa
analyzed: iti manyante na sadṛśaḥ smaḥ iti manyante na hīnāḥ smaḥ iti manyante na anyatra te śroṇa

original: śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā evaṁ yathābhūtasya darśanāt /
analyzed: śramaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā evam yathā bhūtasya darśanāt

original: tat kim manyase śroṇa rūpaṁ nityaṁ vā anityaṁ vā /
analyzed: tat kim manyase śroṇa rūpam nityam vā anityam vā

original: anityam idaṁ bhoḥ śāriputra /
analyzed: anityam idam bhoḥ śāriputra

original: yat punar anityaṁ duḥkhaṁ vā tan na vā duḥkhaṁ vipariṇāmadharma api nu tac chrutavān āryaśrāvaka ātmata upagacched / etan mama eṣo ’ham asmy  #
analyzed: yat punar anityam duḥkham vā tat na vā duḥkham vipariṇāma dharma api nu tat śrutavān ārya śrāvakaḥ ātmataḥ upagacchet etat mama eṣaḥ ham asmi

original: eṣa me ātmeti /
analyzed: eṣa me ātmā iti

original: no bhoḥ śāriputra /
analyzed: no bhoḥ śāriputra

original: kiṁ manyase śroṇa vedanā saṁjñā saṁskārā vijñānaṁ nityaṁ vā anityaṁ vā /
analyzed: kim manyase śroṇa vedanā sajñā saskārāḥ vijñānam nityam vā anityam vā

original: anityam idaṁ bhoḥ śāriputra /
analyzed: anityam idam bhoḥ śāriputra

original: yat punar anityaṁ duḥkhaṁ vipariṇāmadharma api nu tac chrutavān āryaśrāvaka ātmata upagacched / etan mama eṣo ’ham asmi eṣa me ātmeti /
analyzed: yat punar anityam duḥkham vipariṇāma dharma api nu tat śrutavān ārya śrāvakaḥ ātmataḥ upagacchet etat mama eṣaḥ ham asmi eṣa me ātmā iti

original: no bhadanta śāriputra /
analyzed: no bhadanta śāriputra

original: tasmāt tarhi śroṇa yat kiṁ cid rūpam atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṁ vā bāhyaṁ
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi śroṇa yat kim cit rūpam atīta anāgata pratyutpannam ādhyātmikam vā bāhya

original: vā audārikaṁ vā sūkṣmaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā praṇītaṁ vā yad vā dūre yad vā antike tat sarvaṁ /
analyzed: vā audārikam vā sūkṣmam vā hīnam vā praṇītam vā yat vā dūre yat vā antike tat sarvam

original: naitan mama naiṣo ’ham asmi naiṣa me ātmety evam etad yathābhūtaṁ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyaṁ /
analyzed: na etat mama na eṣaḥ ham asmi na eṣa me ātmā iti evam etat yathābhūtam samyak prajñayā draṣṭavyam

original: tasmāt tarhi śroṇa yā kā cid vedanā saṁjñā saṁskārā yat kiṁ cid vijñānam atītānāgatapratyutpannam
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi śroṇa yā kā cit vedanā sajñā saskārāḥ yat kim cit vijñānam atīta anāgata pratyutpannam

original: ādhyātmikaṁ vā bāhyaṁ vā audārikaṁ vā sūkṣmaṁ vā pūrvavad yāvat sa … vān āryaśrāvako
analyzed: ādhyātmikam vā bāhyam vā audārikam vā sūkṣmam vā pūrvavat yāvat sa

original: rūpād api nirvidyate vedanāyāḥ saṁjñāyāḥ saṁskārebhyo vijñānād api nirvidyate nirviṇṇo
analyzed: rūpāt api nirvidyate vedanāyāḥ sajñāyāḥ saskārebhyaḥ vijñānāt api nirvidyate nirviṇṇaḥ

original: virajyate virakto vimucyate vimuktasya vimuktam iti jñānaṁ bhavati kṣīṇā jātir uṣitaṁ
analyzed: virajyate viraktaḥ vimucyate vimuktasya vimuktam iti jñānam bhavati kṣīṇā jātiḥ uṣita

original: brahmacaryaṁ kṛtaṁ karaṇīyaṁ nāparam asmād bhavaṁ prajānāmīty asmin khalu dharmaparyāye
analyzed: brahmacaryam kṛtam karaṇīyam na aparam asmāt bhavam prajānāmi iti asmin khalu dharmaparyāye

original: bhāṣyamāṇe śroṇasya gṛhapatiputrasya virajo vigatamalaṁ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam /
analyzed: bhāṣyamāṇe śroṇasya gṛhapati putrasya virajaḥ vigata malam dharmeṣu dharma cakṣuḥ utpannam

original: atha śroṇo gṛhapatiputro dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā
analyzed: atha śroṇaḥ gṛhapati putraḥ dṛṣṭa dharmā prāpta dharmā vidita dharmā paryavagāḍha dharmā

original: tīrṇṇa kāṁkṣas tīrṇavicikitso … ṣu vaiśāradyaprāpta utthāyāsanād ekāṁsam uttarāsaṅghaṁ
analyzed: tīrṇṇa kākṣaḥ tīrṇa vicikitso  ṣu vaiśāradya prāptaḥ utthāya āsanāt ekāsam uttarāsaṅgha

original: kṛtvā yenāyusmāṁc chāriputras tenāñjaliṁ pranamayya āyusmantaṁ śāriputra idam avocat /
analyzed: kṛtvā yena āyusmāt śāriputraḥ tena añjalim pranamayya āyusmantam śāriputraḥ idam avocat

original: abhikrānto ’haṁ bhadanta śāriputrābhikrāntaḥ yathāhaṁ bhagavantaṁ śaraṇaṁ gacchāmi
analyzed: abhikrāntaḥ ham bhadanta śāriputra abhikrāntaḥ yathā aham bhagavantam śaraṇam gacchāmi

original: dharmaṁ ca bhikṣusaṁghaṁ copāsakaṁ ca māṁ dhārayādyāgreṇa yāvaj jīv … śroṇo gṛhapatiputra
analyzed: dharmam ca bhikṣu sagham ca upāsakam ca mām dhāraya adya agreṇa yāvat jīv śroṇaḥ gṛhapati putra

original: āyuṣmanaḥ śāriputrasya bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodyāyuṣmanaḥ śāriputrasya pādau śirasā
analyzed: āyuṣmanaḥ śāriputrasya bhāṣitam abhinandya anumodya āyuṣmanaḥ śāriputrasya pādau śirasā

original: vanditvā āyuṣmanaḥ śāriputrasyāntikāt prakrāntaḥ //
analyzed: vanditvā āyuṣmanaḥ śāriputrasya antikāt prakrāntaḥ
